text: The Pentax Optio I-10 is a digital premium compact camera announced by Pentax on January 25, 2010. Its design is an example of retro-styling, based on the company's classic Auto 110 micro- SLRs.http://www.dpreview.com/articles/4570179562/pentaxoptioi10 It is marked out as a premium compact by its inclusion of in-body image stabilisation, optional infra-red remote control, 720p video and dynamic range settings. ==References== *http://www.dpreview.com/products/pentax/compacts/pentax_optioi10/specifications Category:Pentax cameras Category:Cameras introduced in 2010
title: Pentax Optio I-10
